text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Subduer of māra's forces, in your wrathful form with its dark complexion,
text.en-trans: düpung jom dzé muknak trowö ku

text.en: Confident in the view, you maintain the unconventional actions of a yogi,
text.en-trans: tawé dengden tulzhuk chöpa kyong

text.en: Prophesied by the Oḍḍiyāna Guru, you are a supreme being a nirmāṇakāya:
text.en-trans: orgyen lungten kyechok trulpé ku

text.en: Thangtong Gyalpo, 'King of the Empty Plain', to you I pray!
text.en-trans: tangtong gyalpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: The peaceful, supreme and noble Great Compassionate One
text.en-trans: zhiwa pakchok tukjé chenpo dang

text.en: And the wrathful, king of the fearsome, Hayagrīva,
text.en-trans: drakpo trowö gyalpo tamdrin gyal

text.en: Are inseparably united in you, the supreme manifestation:
text.en-trans: yermé zungjuk chok gi trulpé ku

text.en: Supreme sovereign of siddhas, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: drubpé khorlö gyur la solwa deb

text.en: Prophesied by the victorious ones, venerable Tsöndrü Zangpo,
text.en-trans: gyalwé lungten tsöndrü zangpö zhab

text.en: You practised yogic conduct throughout the lands of India and Tibet,
text.en-trans: gya bö yuldru küntu tulzhuk kyi

text.en: And became renowned as Thangtong Gyalpo, 'King of the Empty Plain':
text.en-trans: chö dzé tangtong gyalpor nyenpar drak

text.en: Like a second guru of Oḍḍiyāna, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen nyipé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You sponsored supports of enlightened body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: ku sung tuk ten chu la chak zam sok

text.en: The construction of bridges and so on — boundless acts of merit,
text.en-trans: nampar karwé gé tsok pakmé kyi

text.en: Bringing signs of virtue like the unheralded dawn of a new sun,
text.en-trans: ngönmé nyima sarpé getsen chen

text.en: Mahāsiddha, Lord of Dharma, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: drubchen chö kyi jé la solwa deb

text.en: Through the power of praying reverently to you,
text.en-trans: khyö la güpé solwa tabpé tü

text.en: In the places where I and others reside
text.en-trans: dak sok gangdu nepé sachok su

text.en: May illness, harmful influences, poverty and conflict be relieved,
text.en-trans: nedön ulpong tabtsö zhiwa dang

text.en: And may Dharma thrive and auspiciousness increase!
text.en-trans: chö dang tashi pelwar dzé du sol
